Hello,

The parcel 40920308 could not be delivered due to an incorrect or incomplete address.

Please provide us with the correct address, the recipient's name, and phone number. Alternatively, you may ask the carrier to reschedule the delivery.

Thank you.

Regards
Mandi Xhaferaj

Hello écomobile,

I hope you are well.

We have contacted the customer and she confirms receipt of the parcel.

As a result, I'm taking the liberty of closing the claim.

Thank you for your efficiency.

Desiree, BackMarket Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

If the customer does not require any further assistance, you can close this conversation. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
